name: Das Underseaboat
description:
Created for Game Breaker's Toolkit Jam #6, where the goal is to create the worst possible game. This can be charitably described as a parody. Play at your own risk.

Navigate your way through the shipwrecks at the bottom of the Atlantic and escape the Allied destroyers as one of the last U-boat commanders! Your boat is leaking and must be continuously pumped out, and you are low on torpedoes and morale. Can you survive?

How To Play

Use the throttle and rudder controls to navigate your U-boat.

Press the "pump" button repeatedly to pump the flooding out.

Known Issues

  • Crashes sometimes
  • Depth charge warning is sometimes inaudible
  • Sometimes the maze is unsolvable

Credits

  • styanton - Maze Generator asset
  • Chris Veness - SHA-256 (FIPS 180-4) implementation in JavaScript
  • Special Elite Designed by Astigmatic (via Google Fonts)
  • unknown - "Menace" (CC0)
  • Cleyton Kauffman - "Too lazy to put a name on this track" (CC0)
  • A lot of (mostly) public domain stock photos and sound clips
